interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplays after " Not the Nightingale " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " The Collector " .

progression.synopsis: The date is now December 24th. Imani stands in front of the class, having finished recounting a folktale about the origin of tinsel on Christmas trees. With school now truly in session, she begins to take attendance, with the girls clarifying that, not counting the now-expected absence of Sensei and Ami , only Chika and Rin are missing. Taking note of these answers, Imani tells the class to spend the time until lunch doing whatever, being notably lower-energy than usual. The subsequent chatter from the girls reveals that Sensei's all but vanished following the class' Halloween party , with no one hearing from him at all. Throughout the class, the girls all deal with Sensei's continued absence in their own ways:

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.36.
